keyword: calories in a chick fil a 8 piece nuggets
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A 8-Piece Nuggets
meta_description: Learn the calories in a chick fil a 8 piece nuggets: 130 kcal total for grilled, plus protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and variations for your meal planning.
assumptions: Grilled chicken nuggets; standard Chick-fil-A recipe, boneless, no added sauces or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: Chick-fil-A 8-piece grilled nuggets provide 130 kcal and 25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chick-fil-A 8-piece nuggets?
faqs.a: 130 kcal for grilled; 250 kcal for fried version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in Chick-fil-A 8-piece grilled nuggets?
faqs.a: 25 g protein, making it a high-protein fast food option.
Yes, only 1 g total carbs in 8-piece grilled nuggets.

faqs.q: How much sodium in 8-piece Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: 440 mg, so watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Do Chick-fil-A nuggets have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in both grilled and fried 8-piece servings.
